version_description:
- Support bluetooth keyboard input from iPad/iPhone.
- Support Smart Keyboard for iPad Pro.
- Support Touch Bar simulation (for any Mac with macOS Sierra 10.12.2 or later).

- Support new iPhones: iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus and iPhone X.
- Support more Gestures: Rotate/Smart Zoom/Zoom Each App.
- Support iOS 11.

Please update Yam Display for Mac to the latest version.

Support full screen resolution for latest iOS devices:
- 11-inch iPad Pro and 12.9-inch iPad Pro (3rd Gen)
- iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max and iPhone XR

Support iPad Air 3rd Gen and iPad mini 5th Gen.
Automatically hide Home Indicator by default.
Bug fixes for Smart/Bluetooth keyboard input.

Enhanced support for hardware keyboard and mouse connected to iOS devices.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Updated user interface for Apple Pencil.
Bug fixes and stability improvements.

Support Teleprompter Mode (Plus feature).
- On your Mac, update Yam Display for Mac and select "Preferences > Teleprompter Mode".

Bug fixes and stability improvements.
